modName: Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit Remix UNP or CHSBHC
summary: ReTexture and Remake of the famous Mod Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit.
descriptionHtml:
All credit to original modder
Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit: Backsteppo (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11767)
Osare Maid Outfit: anano (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13569)
Witch Hat Clothing: Ochinsama (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11049)
The texture i used mostly copy from the old clothing ( Lady Elegance), sorry i did know the author.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A Remix of clothing try to fix the meshes problem in ver.1.
Why not you go to Preview and have a look yourself?

It is now a standalone version, which mean you DO NOT need other mod. 
(Body  mod is still needed.......OMG this is the basic...)

Weight 0 is UNP body, weight 100 is CHSBHC-NBP body 
(Busty or not?........huh.......)..

To change weight in-game, go command panel, type [player.setnpcweight x]

[x here should be 0 or 100, number between them is imaginary number)

Recommend: weight 0 wear thong, weight 100 wear panty LOL

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Install: NMM
Uninstall: still NMM
(If you have original Sorceress Oufit for UNP, this mod will overwrite it, so choose only one. Hopefully mine.) 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Problem noticed:
Hands disappear: I try to cover it already, please try not to look
feet doesn\'t match: That\'s why i put in stocking and new shoes
Panty cames out!!: Simply take it off, we are gentleman 
Hand disposition:  solution -> www.google.com
Thong dispostion: solution -> error 404


I am not the one make the meshes file and i don\'t have 3Dmax,
 so don\'t FUS RO DAH on me....
DIY!!!!!!!!!!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Feel free to use my mod, do whatever you want (Retexture, Repost, AP, dixty animation.....bah bah bah)

Once again thank you Bethesda for making this awesome game and all the modder working on it. Diablo 3 or Skyrim? This is not a question.
author: felixttf
